word_mean: 丙氨酸：一种天然氨基酸，有两型，α-丙氨酸，CH3CH(NH2)·COOH，即2-氨基丙酸

sentence.Network_en: Alanine appears to be the preferred amino acid in the transamination.
sentence.Network_cn: 丙氨酸在转氨作用中似乎是更好的氨基酸.

sentence.Network_en: In plant cells the principal precursor of alanine , as well as leucine and valine, is pyruvate.
sentence.Network_cn: 植树细胞中丙氨酸和亮氨酸 、 缬氨酸的主要前体是丙酮酸.

sentence.Network_en: And in ischemia 12 h the activity of alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) and aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) were also increased significantly.
sentence.Network_cn: 以血清谷丙转氨酶(alanine aminotransferase,ALT ) 与谷草转氨酶 ( aspartateaminotransferase,AST ) 活性反映肝损伤情况.
